name: Leap-motion-js-api-for-website-navigation
tagline: Leap motion is a sensor device that supports hand and finger motions as input. It is analogous to a mouse but requiring no physical hand contact or touching. Our team has developed an API for leap motion that can be used to navigate websites by hand gestures conveniently.
body:
### Welcome to Leap Motion JS API for website navigation Pages. We hope you will find this useful in some way.
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.

For more details, please see the PDF report here https://github.com/waseda/Leap-Motion-JS-API-for-Website-Navigation/blob/master/leap_report.pdf ### HTTPS clone URL https://github.com/waseda/Leap-Motion-JS-API-for-Website-Navigation.git ### SSH clone URL git@github.com:waseda/Leap-Motion-JS-API-for-Website-Navigation.git ### Subversion checkout URL https://github.com/waseda/Leap-Motion-JS-API-for-Website-Navigation ### Clone on Desktop github-windows://openRepo/https://github.com/waseda/Leap-Motion-JS-API-for-Website-Navigation ### Support or Contact Sorry, we provide no support. Please go to the Leap Motion forum for some expert help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
